Player History
Hit first career homerun on 5/7/1966, off Chuck Nieson (MIN)...
Won World Series with Boston in 1968...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 2/9/1970 to a 4-year deal worth $11,000,001 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against Cincinnati on 5/7/1970...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Pittsburgh on 8/11/1971...
Won World Series with Los Angeles in 1971...
Injured on 7/8/1972 with a Strained Hip Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won World Series with Chicago (N) in 1975...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/1977, hitting .462 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1977, hitting .356 with 6 HR, 21 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Third Base in 1977...
Injured on 7/17/1978 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
